data.title: Movie & TV News, Trailers, Interviews, & Reviews
data.meta_description: The latest movie and television news, reviews, film trailers, exclusive interviews, and opinions - since 2005.
data.text:
3rd Rock From The Sun's 3D Episode Was Meant To Send A Message To The Network

John Lithgow and the cast weren't thrilled about NBC's idea of doing a 3D episode.

Supernatural Storylines You Should Revisit Before Watching The Winchesters

You may not have time to rewatch 327 episodes of 'Supernatural' before 'The Winchesters' premieres, but you might be able to squeeze these in as a refresher.

The Worst Things That Have Happened In The Hellraiser Universe

From the films to the comics as well as Clive Barker's original novella, here are some of the worst things that have happened in the Hellraiser universe.

Sebastian Stan Did Some 'Surreal' Research For His Role In I, Tonya

The day he received the part, Sebastian Stan was offered the opportunity to meet the real Jeff Gilooly.

Sam Rockwell's Comedic Timing Came In Handy On The Set Of Moon

Rockwell knew timing was everything when he was acting opposite himself.

What Drove Edward Norton To Step Into The Directors Chair

'It's such a particular idea and a particular vision...'

Replacing The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' Voices In Post Wasn't A Popular Decision

The actors in the suits thought they'd also be voicing the Turtles.

Is House Of The Dragon Moving Too Fast Or Too Slow For Its Own Game Of Thrones?

This entire first season is a slow-roll prologue that still doesn't allow us time to connect emotionally with its characters.

Karl Urban Always Starts His Characters From Scratch

Building the foundation for his characters is Karl Urban's favorite part of the preparation process.

The 10 Most Terrifying Moments In Hulu's Hellraiser, Ranked

Hulu's 2022 "Hellraiser" reboot has such sights to show you, including these 10 absolutely horrifying moments.

Everything We Know About The Boys Season 4's New Supes

The Seven is adding two new members this season. Here's what we know about Sister Sage and Firecracker.

Every Episode Of Firefly Ranked Worst To Best

Despite being loved by fans, "Firefly" sadly lasted just a single season. Cheer up, Browncoats, we're counting down every episode from worst to best.

The Shootist Showed Ron Howard How Much Of An 'Artist' John Wayne Could Be

Some folks think John Wayne only played one type of character. Those folks are wrong.

Why Scott Derrickson Made Sinister Instead Of Ghost Rider 2 [Exclusive]

The 2012 horror hit came at just the right time for the future Doctor Strange director.

Why Daniel Radcliffe Stars In So Many Weird Movies

'This was a phrase I was using before I did this film: weird begets weird.'

Mob Psycho 100 Delivers Stunning Action, But Also An Endearing Story Of Empathy And Compassion

What do you do when you have all the power in the world, but it does nothing for you?

Luca Guadagnino Sees Bones And All And Call Me By Your Name As Companion Pieces, Of A Sort

'I think it's about the impossibility of the transmission of knowledge within the parameters of such a violent life...'

The Lord Of The Rings: The Rings Of Power Might Be Proving John Rhys-Davies Wrong

The Rings of Power has proven itself to be more than a cash-grab, as John Rhys-Davies once feared.

Will We See The Man Who Fell To Earth Season 2?

If you're hoping to see more adventures in this universe, don't hold your breath.
